alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 30 at 2:07AM CDT until October 31 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas and North Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM Tuesday to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
